steps.description: Identify the hook and pacing button handlers
steps.details: Find the hook and pacing buttons in the mood board analysis panel components. Trace their onClick handlers to the underlying API calls or state mutations.
Ensure the hook button calls hook-specific analysis (e.g., generateHook or similar) and the pacing button calls pacing-specific analysis. Fix any shared handler that conflates the two.
If pacing is not a frequently used feature, remove the pacing button and its handler. Clean up any pacing-related UI and dead code.

technicalNotes: Check the analysis panel component for button definitions
Hook and pacing may share a common AI endpoint with different prompt parameters
